refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The first argument specifies the type of the filter to load and can be one of the following: pre, post or output. The second argument specifies the name of the filter plugin.

example.title: Loading filter plugins
example.programlisting:
<?php

// load prefilter named 'trim'
$smarty->loadFilter('pre', 'trim');

// load another prefilter named 'datefooter'
$smarty->loadFilter('pre', 'datefooter');

// load output filter named 'compress'
$smarty->loadFilter('output', 'compress');

?>

refsect1.para: See also registerFilter(), $autoload_filters and advanced features.
